name: Fast Car Racing Arena
description:
Fast Car Racing Arena!!!
Enjoy the realistic extreme driving extreme racing and extreme Drifting mechanics and its smooth controls. Be a furious car racing, racer in several different environments. Need to put brakes because of more fast racing cars, or racing other rival vehicles, so perform various stunt, drift actions and race at full extreme speed. Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!
Features:
• 3D Graphics and sound effects
• Multiple racing cars
• Breathtaking visuals and amazing racing tracks
• The more perform stunts the more score you get.
• Do not forget to use brake to get rid of accidents.
• New drift car racing tracks
